reviewText: For every yogi/yogini and for anyone even moderately curious about this global phenomenon called yoga, this movie is a must-have.  You will gain a newfound appreciation for what yoga can do for you physically, mentally, emotionally and spiritually.  I watch this DVD on a regular basis, as it reminds me why I fell in yoga with yoga in the first place.
There was no philosophy or deep thinking.  Yet the scenes with Dallas Diamond Page teaching yoga to military personnel in a war zone alone are worth the price of the DVD.
